We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private EaseOfMovementValue _emv;
// In Initialize()
_emv = EMV(symbol,);

// In OnData()
if (_emv.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "EMV Is Ready", _emv.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "EMV Warm Up Period", _emv.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "EMV Current", _emv.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "EMV Name", _emv.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "EMV Samples", _emv.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.emv = self.EMV(symbol,)

# In OnData()
if self.emv.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "EMV Is Ready", self.emv.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "EMV Warm Up Period", self.emv.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "EMV Current", self.emv.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "EMV Name", self.emv.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "EMV Samples", self.emv.Samples);
}
